subdialogue_text: Mm, Unkindled, are we...
And fast on the trail of the Lords absconded?
Then these red eyes are for you.

Use them to pillage embers,
and briefly heighten your strength, for your duty.
What else are unkindled ashes good for?
Pillage embers, for briefly heightened strength, for your duty.
What else are unkindled ashes good for?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text: Well, hasn't it been some time.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text: I'm Leonhard, the Ringfinger.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text: Remember me? I slipped you those red eyes some time ago.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
You're making quite an effort of it.
So I thought you might like to know.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text: If you yearn for a proper red eye orb, one that is uncracked...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
Then kill the Darkwraith,
survivor of the land swallowed by darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
He has been a prisoner, for many ages.
In the deepest cell in all Lothric...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
I can see it in your eyes.
If you didn't invade, didn't pillage, whatever would you do?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
#0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text: If you fancy a proper red eye orb, one uncracked, untainted...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
Then kill the Darkwraith,
survivor of the land swallowed by darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
He has been a prisoner, for many ages.
In the deepest cell in all Lothric...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
subdialogue_text:
I can see it in your eyes.
If you didn't invade, didn't pillage, whatever would you do?

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Pale Tongue
#0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Ah-hah, you've found a proper red eye...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Brilliant. I knew you were no ordinary man.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Brilliant. I knew you were a dangerous woman.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Now invade and pillage all you like.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text:
And if you grow weary of your duty,
you, too, may become a Finger.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Come on, give yourself to Rosaria, of the Cathedral of the Deep.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
#0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Now invade and pillage all you like.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text:
And if you grow weary of your duty,
you, too, may become a Finger.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb
subdialogue_text: Come on, give yourself to Rosaria of the Cathedral of the Deep.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaning a Red Eye Orb

subdialogue_text: What's wrong with you?
Can you even hear me? If you can, cease this at once.
Before it's too late.
I see, I see, as clear as day.
You are a vile, starved beast.
Much too dangerous for her!
You beast. You've trifled with the wrong knight.
Curses, I can't...die here...
My dear Goddess...
Ahh, so you've chosen to serve Rosaria after all.
She will be pleased with me for finding her another Finger...
But be warned, my friend.
Rosaria's Fingers need only fetch tongues for their mistress.
Otherwise, we are free, unchained.

Like Yellowfinger,
you can choose to believe that all Fingers share camaraderie.
But do not force your romance upon the rest of us.
Rosaria's Fingers need only fetch tongues for their mistress.
Otherwise, we are free, unchained.
You are free to believe that all Fingers share camaraderie.
But do not force your romance upon the rest of us.
You are unbecoming of a Finger.
Neither she, nor I, will have you, vile beast...
You rotten beasts, don't you ever forget...
Just what it is you're ravaging...

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: Well, well, never expected to see you here.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: Couldn't resist her any longer, in all her festering glory?

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: Felt sorry for the poor thing, in all her festering glory?

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: And now you want to ravage her soul, as well.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: I sowed the seeds. I'll prune the mess.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom
subdialogue_text: I, Leonhard, swear so upon my vows to the goddess.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Well, well, back for more, are you?

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: No ordinary man, are you. I knew it all along.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Vicious one, aren't you. I knew it all along.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: And now you want to ravage her soul, as well.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: You are no longer of use. You'll run free no more.

behavior: #0After invading him as a Dark Phantom, after previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: I, Leonhard, swear so upon my vows to the goddess.
No one will despoil her soul.
Certainly no beast wrapped in human skin!
What do you want with her soul?
Isn't flesh enough for a sick beast!
Enough with you, my friend.
A knight of the goddess does not die.
(No caption) Blessed Rosaira...
##Remember me? I slipped you those red eyes back in Lothric.

##He has been a prisoner, for many ages.
Deep below the tower, just behind us now...

##He has been a prisoner, for many ages.
Deep below the tower, just behind us now...
##The stones on that bastard, to show his face round here...
##Though he does well to hide his claws...
##That bastard, who does he think he is?
##He needs to be reminded. Of the grovelling pig that he is...
##Wait! Stay out of this!
##This pig deserves his death!

##If you dare question this knight's justice,
an enemy of mine you shall be!
##Drown in your trough! You filthy pig!
##Didn't I tell you?
##Rosaria's Fingers take no allegiance with one another.
##And this pig fully deserved his death.
##At least, as far as I see it.
##Isn't that enough for you?
##(laugh)
##This pig fully deserved his death.
##At least, as far as I see it.
##Isn't that enough for you?
##You are a vile, rapacious beast...
##I should have never let you near her...
